Actions.Name: Delete event
Actions.Description: This operation deletes an event in a calendar.

This action has been deprecated. Please use Get event (V2) instead.

Actions.Name: Delete contact
Actions.Description: This operation deletes a contact from a contacts folder.

Actions.Description: This operation gets a specific contact from a contacts folder.

Actions.Description: This operation gets contacts from a contacts folder.

Actions.Description: This operation deletes an email by id.

Actions.Name: Mark as read
Actions.Description: This operation marks an email as having been read.

Actions.Name: Move email
Actions.Description: This operation moves an email to the specified folder.

This operation triggers a flow when an email is flagged.

Actions.Name: When an email is flagged (V2)
Actions.Description: This operation triggers a flow when an email is flagged.

Actions.Name: When a new email arrives [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description:
This action has been deprecated. Please use When a new email arrives (V2) instead.
This operation triggers a flow when a new email arrives. It will skip any email that has a total message size greater than the limit put by your Exchange Admin or 50 MB, whichever is less. It may also skip protected emails and emails with invalid body or attachments.

Actions.Name: When a new email arrives (V2)
Actions.Description: This operation triggers a flow when a new email arrives. It will skip any email that has a total message size greater than the limit put by your Exchange Admin or 50 MB, whichever is less. It may also skip protected emails and emails with invalid body or attachments.

Actions.Name: When a new email mentioning me arrives [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description:
This action has been deprecated. Please use When a new email mentioning me arrives (V2) instead.
This operation triggers a flow when a new email mentioning me arrives. It will skip any email that has a total message size greater than the limit put by your Exchange Admin or 50 MB, whichever is less. It may also skip protected emails and emails with invalid body or attachments.

Actions.Name: When a new email mentioning me arrives (V2)
Actions.Description: This operation triggers a flow when a new email mentioning me arrives. It will skip any email that has a total message size greater than the limit put by your Exchange Admin or 50 MB, whichever is less. It may also skip protected emails and emails with invalid body or attachments.

Actions.Name: Send approval email
Actions.Description: This operation sends an approval email and waits for a response from the recipient. Please refer to the following link regarding the support of actionable messages in different mail clients: https://docs.microsoft.com/outlook/actionable-messages/#outlook-version-requirements-for-actionable-messages.

This operation sends an email message.

Actions.Description: This operation sends an email message.

Actions.Name: Send email with options
Actions.Description: This operation sends an email with multiple options and waits for the recipient to respond back with one of the options. Please refer to the following link regarding the support of actionable messages in different mail clients: https://docs.microsoft.com/outlook/actionable-messages/#outlook-version-requirements-for-actionable-messages.
